title: Social Media - SMCollection
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic SMCollection made for the Social Media domain. This entity is primarily associated with the process of collection of Social Media posts (primarily Twitter).

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It must be equal to SMCollection.

description.description: Property.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. General description of the SMCollection.

hasPost.description: Relationship.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The IDs of the SMPost that belong in this SMCollection.

isAnalyzedBy.description: Relationship.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Units:'No unit'. The ID of the SMAnalysis that analyzes this SMCollection.
